skyblocker.config.uiAndVisuals.bars: Health, Mana, Defence, Speed & XP Bars
skyblocker.config.dungeons.croesusHelper: Grey out chests that have already been opened.
skyblocker.config.dungeons.livid.enableL: Send the livid colour in the chat during the Livid boss fight.
skyblocker.config.dungeons.livid.lividCo: Text which will be sent in the chat during the Livid boss fight. The string "[color]" will be replaced with the livid colour.
skyblocker.customDyeColors.notDyeable: §cThis item isn't a dyeable armour piece!
skyblocker.customDyeColors.added: §fSet a custom dye colour for your currently held item!
skyblocker.customDyeColors.noItemUuid: §cYou must be holding an item that has a uuid to set a custom dye colour!
skyblocker.customArmorTrims.neverHad: §fThis item doesn't have an armour trim set, but why not add one? ;)
skyblocker.customArmorTrims.added: §fSet a custom armour trim for your currently held item!
skyblocker.customArmorTrims.unableToSetT: §cUnable to set a custom armour trim :( (Are you in skyblock?, are you holding an item?)
skyblocker.customDyeColors.neverHad: §fThis item doesn't have a custom dye colour set, but why not add one? ;)
skyblocker.customDyeColors.unableToSetCo: §cUnable to set a custom dye colour :( (Are you in skyblock?, are you holding an item?)
skyblocker.customArmorTrims.noItemUuid: §cYou must be holding an item that has a uuid to set a custom armour trim!
skyblocker.config.dungeons.dungeonChestP:
Displays the profit of a dungeon chest in the chest screen's title.
Green if there's profit.
Red if there isn't profit.
Grey if you don't gain or lose anything.
Blue if calculations were based on incomplete data.
skyblocker.config.general.itemInfoDispla: Displays a coloured background behind an item, the colour represents the item's rarity.
skyblocker.config.general.itemTooltip.en: Displays the type of exotic below the item's name if an armour piece is exotic.
skyblocker.tips.customArmorDyeColors: Apply a custom dye colour to your leather armour with /skyblocker custom dyeColor
skyblocker.tips.customArmorTrims: You can set custom armour trims on your armour using /skyblocker custom armorTrim.
skyblocker.config.dungeons.livid.enableL: Display the livid colour in the title during the Livid boss fight.
Input a new message to output (can be formatted using minecraft colour codes).
skyblocker.tips.customAnimatedDyes: You can apply a custom animated dye to your leather armour with /skyblocker custom animatedDye!
skyblocker.customAnimatedDyes.invalidHex: §cAn invalid HEX colour code was supplied!
skyblocker.customAnimatedDyes.notDyeable: §cThis item isn't a dyeable armour piece!
skyblocker.dwarvenMines.metalDetectorHel: Found the centre of mines, now working faster
skyblocker.debug.toggledShowingInvisible: Toggled showing invisible armour stands to %s
skyblocker.tips.fancierBars: Customize the look of your health, mana, defence, speed, and experience bars with /skyblocker bars. You can snap and resize bars too!
skyblocker.config.dungeons.livid.enableS: Enable Glow and/or Bounding use same colour
Instead of the Livid's colour a red colour is shown
skyblocker.config.crimsonIsle.kuudra.dan: Displays a warning when you're in danger from a tentacle slam or from TNT. The colour of the warning adapts to the danger level!
What colour the treasure chests / lock pick should be highlighted.
skyblocker.config.slayer.blazeSlayer.att: If Boss Highlighting is on, applies a colour matching the current attunement to the selected effect.
skyblocker.config.debug.dumpFormat.@Tool: The format to use when dumping items. SNBT is coloured and easier to read while JSON has escaped string characters (double quotes).
skyblocker.config.mining.dwarvenMines.ca: Sets the colour of the highlight for the unbreakable carpets.
skyblocker.config.dungeons.classBasedPla: Changes the colour of your teammates glow to be based on their class rather than their rank.
skyblocker.config.helpers.carnival.zombi: Outlines lit redstone lamps in red, and applies the glowing effect to zombies where the colour depends on the kind of zombie.
skyblocker.config.uiAndVisuals.healthBar: Colour of health bar when mob is at full hp
Colour of health bar when mob is at half hp
Colour of health bar when mob is at full hp
